msg: In README, change min ant version to 1.7.1 since this is required by the Apache batik build.xml file (fileset errormissingdirectory attribute) and add instructions for building the RSLs.  Fix the two scripts to check for the RSLs directory and add the RSLs requirement to the header comment.
